get.summary: Retrieve a paginated list of products categories
get.description: Retrieve a paginated list of product categories based on the provided sorting and pagination parameters.

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search the results by the specified field.

parameters.name: sort_by
parameters.description: Sort the results by the specified field.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort direction for the results.

parameters.name: per_page
parameters.description: Number of product categories per page. Must be between 1 and 100.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number to retrieve. Must be a positive integer.

message.example: An unexpected error occurred while processing the request.

post.description: Create a new product category with the provided data.

get.summary: Get paginated list of products with filters and sorting

parameters.name: sort

parameters.name: per_page
parameters.description: Number of products per page

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number

parameters.name: price
parameters.description: Filter for price

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Filter for name

parameters.name: category
parameters.description: Filter for category name

200.description: Successful operation. Returns a paginated list of products.
